scripts.test: TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TIMEOUT=40000 TRYORAMA_ZOME_CALL_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 ts-node index.ts | tap-diff
scripts.test-signals: TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TIMEOUT=40000 TRYORAMA_ZOME_CALL_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 ts-node signal-test.ts | tap-diff
scripts.test-basic: TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TIMEOUT=40000 TRYORAMA_ZOME_CALL_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 ts-node basic-test.ts | tap-diff
scripts.test-basic-full-index: TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TIMEOUT=40000 TRYORAMA_ZOME_CALL_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 ts-node basic-full-index-test.ts | tap-diff
scripts.test-pagination: RUST_LOG=error,holochain_p2p::spawn::actor=error,holochain::core::workflow::integrate_dht_ops_workflow=error,holochain::core::workflow::publish_dht_ops_workflow=error,wasmer_compiler_cranelift::translator::func_translator=error,hc_time_index::dfs::methods=error TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TIMEOUT=40000 TRYORAMA_ZOME_CALL_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 ts-node pagination-test.ts | tap-diff
scripts.build-test: cd ../../ && cp workdir/dna_time_index.yaml workdir/dna.yaml && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm test
scripts.build-test-signals: cd ../../ && cp workdir/dna_signals.yaml workdir/dna.yaml && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-signals
scripts.build-test-basic: cd ../../ && cp workdir/dna_basic.yaml workdir/dna.yaml && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-basic
scripts.build-test-basic-full-index: cd ../../ && cp workdir/dna_basic_full_index.yaml workdir/dna.yaml && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-basic-full-index
scripts.build-test-pagination: cd ../../ && cp workdir/dna_signals.yaml workdir/dna.yaml && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-pagination
scripts.build-test-all: npm run build-test && npm run build-test-basic && npm run build-test-signals && npm run build-test-pagination && npm run build-test-basic-full-index
